ReadWriteWeb. Google's three priorities are all about mobile, as they should be.`` First, we must focus on developing the underlying fast networks( generally called LTE),'' Eric Schmidt writes. Second, we must attend to the development of mobile money, he continues.`` Third, we want to increase the availability of inexpensive smartphones in the poorest parts of the world.''
